description:
A small boy fights a demon.  The wind god takes children to a mystical land.  A lord goes thumpity-thump.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Issunboushi / Kaze no Kami to Kodomo-tachi / Sutton Korori no Odono-sama
Little One Inch / The Wind God & the Children / The Lord Goes Thumpity-Thud
一寸法師 / 風の神と子供たち / すっとんころりのおとの様
